ComicInfo.Summary:
Book 2 of Race of Scorpions continues from Leo Duranona as our heroes are caught in an ambush between government troops and rebels in "The Alley Where Sorrows End". Also, Rich Rice's Bob the Alien "Gets Swindled" by the oldest con in the books--but one that ends with a surprising twist! And, The Zone, by Michael Kraiger, lumbers him into a new series of adventures!
